Welcome to the MM4SPA Project

This is the official project page of the MM4SPA joint research project. Check out the project description, project partners (DSHS, L3S, KINEXON) and latest news.

To stay updated you can also follow us on Twitter.

Click here for all information on our upcoming Workshop on Multimodal Analysis of Spatio-Temporal Data!

uLKIS

  • uLKIS
  • maxklemp92@gmail.com
  • uLKIS

uLKIS is a BMBF-funded project, carried out at German Sport University Cologne, aiming at creating Open Educational Resources for improving Data Science and Machine Learning skills among sports students.
